title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7006.5 - Investigative processes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7006.5 - Investigative processes

State Regulations
(a) An
investigation into the facts and circumstances of the incident shall be
initiated if the chief administrative officer determines that the circumstances
warrant such an investigation. (b) In those cases where an investigation is deemed necessary, the investigation
shall be conducted by persons who were not involved in the incident, and a
completed report shall be provided to the hearing officer prior to any hearing
based on the incident investigated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7006.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
